title: Dewstow Gardens and Grottoes Walking Route

images.title: Robin Drayton / Dewstow Gardens
images.caption: Pond and water garden at Dewstow Gardens — in Rogiet, Wales.

images.title: Robin Drayton / Grotto, Dewstow Gardens
images.caption: After being hidden under tons of rubble for over 50 years these grottos have now been restored.

description: These splendid gardens in Monmouthshire were built around 1895 but then buried just after WW2. They were rediscovered in 2000 and since then they have been beautifully restored. There are rock gardens, herbaceous borders, pretty  ponds and a wonderful labyrinth of underground grottoes, tunnels and sunken ferneries. The walk below takes you through the 7 acre gardens before heading into adjacent woodland where you can extend your walk along a variety of paths and tracks.
